info.description: Represents content authors, including AI agents and human writers for the GLAD Labs content engine.

Name.description: Full name of the author (e.g., 'Matthew M. Gladding' or 'Content Agent v1.2')

Bio.description: Short biography or description of the author

Avatar.description: Profile picture or avatar for the author

IsAIAgent.description: True if this author is an AI agent, false for human authors
